statements.sql: select `A`.*, `B`.`slug`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`meta_seo` from `seos` as `A` left join `seo_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`seo_id` where FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`link` = 'http://localhost/laravel/01679933525/gio-hang/add' and `B`.`language` = 'vi' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 1
